resources.string: Use reminder to start eating later instead of wizard result during high glycemia ("pre-bolus")

You have high glycemia. Instead of eating now it\'s recommended to wait for better glycemia. Do you want to do a correction bolus now and remind you when it\'s time to eat? In this case no carbs will be recorded and you must use wizard again when we remind you.
Time to bolus!\nRun Bolus wizard and do calculation again.
